creator: Jaween Ediriweera
descriptionHtml:
Draw in the pixel art style, improve your skills and share your creations!
Use the canvas to create video game sprites, images and more.

Why use Pixel Brush?


✅ Art is auto-saved for peace of mind
✅ Relax with the intuitive interface on phones and tablets
✅ Use any colour with customisable palettes
✅ Pixel perfect strokes for lines and shapes
✅ Easily work on pixels with the convenient auto-thumbnail
✅ Share drawings in high quality

Features coming next


🔜 Animation
🔜 Pixel Brush for non-Android devices!

Follow Pixel Brush on Instagram: https://instagram.com/_u/pixelbrush.app
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pixelbrush_app
descriptionShort: Create works of pixel art! Designed for all skill levels!

title: Pixel Brush - Pixel art creator

creator: Jaween Ediriweera
descriptionHtml:
Pixel Brush is a sprite maker and a pixel art creator studio, for artists.
Designed for aspiring artists and pixel professionals, or even general doodling, Pixel Brush is the pixel art creator for all.

Features:
• Powerful tools
• Clip images: Copy and paste support
• Intuitive: Just pinch-to-zoom and tap-to-draw
• Stay focused: No ads
• Easy to use: A preview appears whenever you're zoomed in
• Stay organized: Each layer has its own pixels
• Draw with pixel perfect lines and shapes
• Support for isometric art
• Friendly Discord community to help you improve your art skills
• Dark theme
• Exports sharp images to your gallery, no blurring
• Pixel grid
• Unlimited custom color palettes
• Auto-saving with backups, so you never lose your work

Pixel Brush aims to help you draw pixel art seen in classic arcade games and video games, or choose to draw double wide pixels for Commodore 64 (C64) sprites.

Coming soon:
• Sprite animation (frame-by-frame animator, onion skinning and frame linking)
• Improved mouse and keyboard support
• Pencil/pen support

• Sharp exports with no blurring

• You can use a mouse if you'd prefer!
